name: Masters of Cards
summary: Masters of Cards is a free collectible card game inspired by the classic Heróis e Vampiros. It offers innovative mechanics, strategic gameplay, and balanced starting decks to ensure fairness. Players can build and evolve their decks over time, customize their characters, and compete in exciting battles. With fast-paced battles, new features, and improved stability, MAOC delivers a fast, stable, and engaging card game experience.
